solution_line_template: Gaining progress, she can lift up to {maya_initial_lift}+{progress_increment}=<<{maya_initial_lift}+{progress_increment}={maya_after_progress}>>{maya_after_progress} pounds.
At her peak, she can lift {america_peak_lift}*{maya_peak_fraction}=<<{america_peak_lift}*{maya_peak_fraction}={maya_peak_lift}>>{maya_peak_lift} pounds.
Maya's peak is {maya_peak_lift} pounds - {maya_initial_lift} pounds when she started = <<{maya_peak_lift}-{maya_initial_lift}={maya_gain}>>{maya_gain} more pounds than when she started.
